Asked to choose his best game of the season, Michael Vick selected the playoff game against the Packers, despite three sacks, an interception on the final throw and a season-ending loss. Honestly, it might sound crazy, but( the Packers game) I just felt so much confidence, Michael Vick told PFW. "I was just so in tune with everything: the protection, the blitz, where it was coming from, all my progressions, where everybody was supposed to be lined up.

of course. Simon Cowell , Nigel Lythgoe had a lot to say about him as well as he talks about how the show was getting to dark with Simon Cowell 's constant nasty remarks to contestants. He goes on to say I think Steven Tyler and Jennifer Lopez are both stars in their own right. You forget that we've had this train wreck that was following Simon Cowell , and then Simon Cowell disassociated himself from the show over the last few years, turned his back on the strange people they brought in to judge. So I knew it was going to be better than people expected. He adds that the show has never been about Simon Cowell and he was the one person not worried when people told him to give up on Idol after Simon Cowell 's departure.
